scripts.scss:dev: sass --embed-source-map --style=compressed src/scss/critical.scss tmp/scss/critical.css && sass --style=compressed src/scss/non-critical.scss dist/css/non-critical.css
scripts.scss: sass --style=compressed --no-source-map src/scss/critical.scss src/site/_includes/critical.css && sass --style=compressed --no-source-map src/scss/non-critical.scss dist/css/non-critical.css
scripts.autoprefixer:dev: postcss tmp/scss/critical.css --output src/site/_includes/critical.css --use autoprefixer && postcss dist/css/non-critical.css --use autoprefixer --map --replace
scripts.styles:dev: npm run scss:dev && npm run autoprefixer:dev
scripts.styles: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:assets: npm run styles && npm run autoprefixer && npm run styles:print
scripts.build:devassets: npm run styles:dev && npm run autoprefixer:dev && npm run styles:print
scripts.build:dev: npm run clear && npm run build:devassets && npm run build:eleventy
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build:assets && npm run build:eleventy
scripts.start: npm run clear && npm run build:devassets && run-p serve watch
scripts.staging:
npm run build && echo 'User-agent: *
Disallow: /' > dist/robots.txt
scripts.bump:major: bump major --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json
scripts.bump:minor: bump minor --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json
scripts.bump:patch: bump patch --commit 'Bumps version number to %s' src/site/_data/site.json *.json
